project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that challenges users with multiple-choice questions and keeps track of their scores, displaying the final score at the end of the game.

task.name: Implement functionality to display questions and collect user input
Implement scoring logic to keep track of the user's score
Implement functionality to display the final score after all questions are answered
Write tests for the question display and scoring functionality
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
